org.appkit.util
Class SmartExecutor

java.lang.Object
  org.appkit.util.SmartExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Executor, Throttle.Supplier, Ticker.Supplier
public final class SmartExecutor
extends Object
implements Executor, Throttle.Supplier, Ticker.Supplier

An Executor that provides commonly-used methods. It uses a Scheduler-Thread to schedule and run tasks.

Method Summary

 void scheduleAtFixedRate(long interval, TimeUnit timeUnit, Runnable runnable)
          Schedules a Runnable to be executed using a fixed delay between the end of a run and the start of the next

          Shuts the executor down (ExecutorService.shutdown())

Method Detail

start

public static SmartExecutor start()
Creates a new instance based on a cached thread-pool. It has to be shutdown after use.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if this executor was created based on another ExecutorService
